title: Client freezing after champion selection phase
body:
For some reason, the rest of my client works fine. But whenever I try to get into a game, after the timer runs down after champ select after we've picked all of our champions, the screen goes black and I can't get out of it unless I force a shutdown on my computer.

Can a rioter or technician tell me why it's doing this? It's caused me to "leave" two games now, but I'm not doing it on purpose.

replies.body:
That's really strange behaviour. If you're running Windows 10, it's possible this is a direct result of the Anniversary updates that enabled Game DVR in the Xbox app. As a quick check, you can [disable the game bar entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if anything changes by following this guide.

Let me know if that changed anything.
I don't use Windows 10. I use a Mac OX 10.10.5

Thanks for clarifying. It sounds like you may be experiencing issues on a hardware/system level, so I recommend taking a look at the steps outlined in our [Bugsplat & Crashing guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes). Many of those steps are likely to get us one step closer to solving this issue for good.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
I havethe same problem they literally told me its connection issues and left me in the dirt
there was no way it was connection issues, since everything else that required an connection worked just fine.
